document_data.name: Kassawar Plickenstint
document_data.mainbody: '''Kassawar Plickenstint''' was the primary [[deep gnome]] delegate in [[Mantol-Derith]] in [[1372 DR]].
document_data.History: Kassawar was the representative of [[Blingdenstone]] in the merchant outpost of Mantol-Derith. After [[1371 DR]], he was chosen as the representative of [[Luruar]], but the deep gnomes there produced a smaller portion of goods than before. So Kassawar had little to do and spent a lot of his time just staring at nothing.
document_data.Personality: Kassawar greatly suffered for the loss of his home city and spent most of his time in mourning.
